segments.text: It seems to me that you fall for good-looking guys .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you date up a handsome guy and spend time together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have found myself a date mate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must have a lot in common and a barrel of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A barrel of fun , of course . He often says that I'm a date bait .
segments.speaker: S2
